company.text1: We are a non-scheduled air transport company dedicated to tailor each trip to our clients. We hold all certifications required by the ANAC (National Civil Aviation Administration) for both our aircrafts and crew members. We have a fleet that allows us to operate in all authorized airports and unprepared runways in the country, always ensuring safety, privacy, and comfort.
company.text2: We provide a unique and personalized flight experience. Experience elegance in an affordable way and enjoy a flight that has the best in comfort and technology.

fleet.heading: Our fleet
fleet.subtitle: Our entire fleet and crew adhere to the highest standards of quality and safety.

services.heading: Services
services.subHeading: Discover our services designed especially for you.
services.text1: No check-ins, no waiting, tailored exclusively to your needs.
services.text2: Last-minute opportunities. Register for more information.
services.text3: We offer third-party aircraft management, operation, and maintenance services.

modal.title: Your question was sucessfully sent.
modal.body: Thank you for reaching out! We will contact you quickly.
